profile.title: Hi, I'm Aria
profile.hobbie: I am passionate about the digital world and design to serve users.

about.title: About me
about.about: Hello, my name is Alessandro Fernandez Medrano, but you know me as Aria, I'm 18 years old and I'm from Moyobamba - Peru, I'm studying Web development at Academlo so that in the future I'll work in the field with recognized companies and form a good profile as Web Dev.

experience.title: Experience
experience.careerTwo: Full Stack Web Development and Computer Science

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.pyoyect_one_description: Browse products by prices or categories, log in, add them to your cart and see your purchase history!
portfolio.pyoyect_two_description: Explore hundreds of pokémons, filter them by type, see their advanced details with just one Click!
portfolio.pyoyect_three_description: Create user cards by entering their data, delete them and edit them as you like!
portfolio.pyoyect_four_description: Check the weather in your area with this nice App! Don't forget to give Location permission.
portfolio.pyoyect_five_description: Tap the button and you will be shown a completely random famous phrase!
portfolio.pyoyect_six_description: Choose some products, add them to the cart and buy them, but first check if there is any Stock left!
portfolio.pyoyect_seven_description: Solved JavaScript exercises from the Replit Platform (.js format open with VS Code or similar).
portfolio.pyoyect_eight_description: Notes of what was learned in the Pre-start course in Academlo in PDF.
